      • fromString

        public TextGrid fromString(java.lang.String str_tgt)
                    throws TextGridIOException
        Load the string formatted textgrid. Only long format supported for now
        Parameters:
        str_tgt - the textgrid in a string format
        Returns:
        the loaded textgrid object
        Throws:
        TextGridIOException - if a problem occurs. See message for more explanation

      • readLongTextGrid

                                           throws TextGridIOException
        Parsing the content of the textgrid (header should be already stripped)
        Parameters:
        lines - the list of remaining lines to analyze
        Returns:
        the list of loaded tiers
        Throws:
        TextGridIOException - if a problem occurs. See message for more explanation

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString(TextGrid tgt)
                          throws TextGridIOException
        Export the given textgrid to a properly formatted String. Only long format is supported for now
        Parameters:
        tgt - the textgrid to export
        Returns:
        the formatted textgrid
        Throws:
        TextGridIOException - if a problem occurs. See message for more explanation

      • save

        public void save(TextGrid tgt,
                 java.io.File output_file)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Save the textgrid to a file Only long format is supported for now
        Parameters:
        tgt - the textgrid to export
        output_file - the file which is going to contain the formatted textgrid
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a problem occurs and more specifically a TextGridIOException if it is relating to the formatting.
